<h3 id="X38032">X(38032) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(3), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^7-6*(b+c)*a^6-(7*b^2-22*b*c+7*c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(13*b^2-24*b*c+13*c^2)*a^4+2*(b^4+c^4-2*b*c*(5*b^2-8*b*c+5*c^2))*a^3-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(4*b^2-5*b*c+4*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38032) = X(1)+2*X(6713) = X(3)+2*X(1387) = X(11)+2*X(1385) = X(104)+5*X(3616) = 5*X(104)+X(9809) = X(104)+2*X(11729) = X(119)-4*X(1125) = X(119)+2*X(11715) = 4*X(140)-X(1145) = 2*X(214)+X(37726) = X(355)-4*X(6667) = 2*X(1125)+X(11715) = 5*X(3616)-2*X(11729) = X(9809)-10*X(11729) = 3*X(23513)-2*X(38161) = 3*X(32557)-X(38161) = 3*X(34122)-2*X(38177) = 3*X(34126)-X(38177) = 3*X(38026)-X(38038) = 3*X(38026)-2*X(38044)</b>
<p>X(38032) lies on these lines: {1,6713}, {2,952}, {3,1387}, {11,1385}, {30,38026}, {100,16202}, {104,3560}, {119,1125}, {140,1145}, {149,6897}, {153,6898}, {214,24299}, {355,6667}, {511,38050}, {515,23513}, {516,38124}, {517,5298}, {518,38119}, {519,38069}, {528,3653}, {551,2800}, {631,1320}, {944,31272}, {971,38060}, {1317,10039}, {1319,6882}, {1388,26492}, {1482,6961}, {1484,10609}, {1537,5901}, {1621,18861}, {2802,10165}, {2829,5886}, {3035,12737}, {3036,37727}, {3576,5840}, {3622,6977}, {3624,12751}, {3636,25485}, {4297,16174}, {4308,11929}, {5533,37525}, {5690,25416}, {5731,32558}, {5762,7677}, {5848,38029}, {5851,38030}, {5854,26446}, {5856,38031}, {5882,6702}, {5887,15528}, {6246,33709}, {6265,20418}, {6699,31523}, {6850,10738}, {6892,13226}, {6893,10742}, {6920,13257}, {6937,12690}, {6940,33814}, {6941,34773}, {6981,18525}, {7491,37618}, {7968,13913}, {7969,13977}, {7987,14217}, {8068,21842}, {9624,34789}, {9840,10035}, {10058,10269}, {10074,22759}, {10090,10267}, {10993,21630}, {11570,13373}, {11713,29008}, {12119,30389}, {12515,37612}, {12735,19914}, {12758,34339}, {13462,37826}, {13607,15863}, {13624,24466}, {13729,22799}, {13902,19081}, {13959,19082}, {15558,37562}, {15808,21635}, {18240,24474}, {18857,30384}, {22938,37437}, {24928,32554}, {26287,37722}, {28186,38141}, {28204,38156}, {28208,38077}, {28444,38053}, {30392,37718}</p>
<p>
X(38032) = midpoint of X(3576) and X(16173)<br>
X(38032) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (23513, 32557), (34122, 34126), (34123, 38028), (38038, 38044), (38128, 38133), (38156, 38182)<br>
X(38032) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (104, 3616, 11729), (1125, 11715, 119), (10246, 38028, 38033), (12619, 15178, 1317), (19914, 37624, 12735), (38026, 38038, 38044), (38069, 38128, 38133)<br>
</p>
